transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ji sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai. Hello.
Customer: Ji ji unhone aapne kuch maine unko aapki taraf link aapki send kari thi unko madam ko to aapne kya ho gaya tha aapka editing jo bhi karna tha product mein?
Executive: Haan haan actually sir kya tha ki maine ranking wagera theek ki thi. Kyunki ranking wagera theek nahi hui to buyleads mein issue aata hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To maine ranking to theek kar di. Kitni bhi ranking thi products wagera thi.
Customer: Haan. Kya bolte hain? Aapne ranking ranking theek kar di kya phir?
Executive: Haan haan maine ranking wagera sare products wagera sab properly theek kar diye.
Customer: Okay. Catalog ka scoring wagera reh gaya hai.
Executive: Catalog ka jo score hota hai wo madam bol rahi thi main kar dungi.
Customer: Achcha. Kyunki kya hota hai ranking.
Executive: Unhone kaha tha kar denge.
Customer: Haan wo kar lenge.
Executive: Ek minute line par rehna aap jaana nahi hai. Ek minute line par rehna.
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
(silence)
Customer: Ye madam line par hain IndiaMART se?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aapne inse ye bola ki aap kar loge product jo bhi kuch usme score wagera kuch kam hai wo kar loge. Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji madam.
Executive: Hello. Haan maine unse bola tha to maine unse bol hello. Haan ji madam.
Customer: Aawaz aa rahi hai? Hello. Haan haan mujhe aa rahi hai. Ji ji madam.
Executive: Haan apna ye discussion hua tha ki ranking wagera to theek kar di thi. Then catalog ka scoring wagera tha to baad mein hua tha ki aap kar lena kyunki haan haan wahi baat hui thi kya bol rahe the?
Customer: Haan yahi baat hui thi. Aur aapne bola tha nahi aayega to wo kara dengi unhone ye bola.
Executive: Haan. Aapko lag raha hai aap kar loge?
Customer: Sir sirf score hi to increase karna hai sirf thodi si information mention karni hai sirf.
Executive: Madam main is product ko khud add kar chuka hu aur mere se nahi hua to aap inse inse ho jayega?
Customer: Kya ji kya nahi hua?
Executive: Main ye bol rahi hu catalog ki jo ranking hoti hai ji ji ranking wagera hoti hai sir wo maine sari cheeze add kar di product bhi add kar diya bas uski information dalni hai. Yani ki photo dalna hai, price dalna hai, specifications dalne hain. Agar nahi ho raha to wo main karwa deti hu ya inse kar deti hu. Theek hai?
Customer: Main aapse puch raha hu ye jo product hai kuch add kare the maine aaj se 15 din pehle.
Executive: Haan aapne kuch products add kiye the.
Customer: 15 din pehle aaj se lagbhag mujhe aisa yaad hai mere sath 15 13 14 15 din ho gaye honge lagbhag.
Executive: Aapne kya tha?
Customer: Haan tab se maine inko bola hai ki madam se call karke inko connect kar lena kya hai basic information maine sari bhar di rate maine bhar di inme uska jo bhi hota hai matlab aur kuch category wise customer wise ye price customer jaise kuch jo bhi aap bharna hota hai bhar diya. Kuch pick uthai maine but wo pick kya hai wo pata nahi 500 pixel ke hote kya hote aapke wo picture.
Executive: Haan 1000 1000 pixels ke hote hain na.
Customer: Haan wo nahi aa raha hai to main usko bahut baar koshish kari jitni aayi maine dal di. Uske baad matlab aapke liye hi total problem hai. Piche se nahi ho raha kya sirf aap.
Executive: Ji. Piche se nahi ho raha kya? Piche laptop se photo wagera upload nahi hue kya?
Customer: Yes maine photo jo the mere paas aur jo maine google se uthane ki koshish kari ab hota kya hai na main itna free to hu nahi ki main pixel search karta rahu itna na mere paas itna talent hota ki main ek filter lagaunga usme phir 500 500 by 500 ka main search karu phir usko upload karu isse matlab phir kyun hai jarurat hai aap logo ki main khud hi kar lunga phir to sab ban jata hu.
Executive: Sir wo ek baat bataiye sir wo main ek baat bataiye aapne account manager rakha hua hai theek hai wo meri aur madam ka discussion hai madam ne bola tha ki main kar leti hu usme koi issue aayega to main connect kar lungi ya phir main mujhe connect kar leti hu.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Last hamara ye discussion ho gaya hai mapping wagera meri sari cheeze ho gayi hain. Theek hai?
Executive: Koi baat nahi. Ji. Abhi main nahi chahta hu aapse ye jo ho gaya. Theek hai main is tarike se baat karte mera ek bhi product aisa na reh jaye jiski mujhe score kam dikhe mujhe 70 se kam kisi bhi cheez ka score nahi chahiye. Theek aapko information mujhse chahiye mujhse aap voice call pe le lena kyunki mujhe ye aapka miss call ke liye mere ko nahi hota time aapne jab aapne bola mere paas mehmaan baithe the unse baat kar raha hu us time aapse bhi karu keh raha nahi ho pata hai dikkat hoti hai mujhe. Matlab aapne ek request karna hu ki maine isliye inko appoint kiya hua hai ki aap log discussion karo. Haan kuch.
Executive: Wahi baat sir.
Executive: Sir dekhiye wahi baat madam ko bhi kuch prices nahi pata hote wo aapko hi pata hote isliye madam aapko connect bhi karti hongi. Baki main roll dalungi phir aapko wahi cheeze option.
Customer: Koi baat nahi aage se isliye main bol raha hu aaj ke liye chhod utara aaj unka yahi chhod do sab ab main main aapko batau main kitne aath din se cheeze nazar bana ke rakha hai maine ki IndiaMART matlab mujhe nahi utar pa raha hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Main us hisab se. Ji sir maine aaj ranking wagera theek ki hai.
Executive: Sir ye products add kiye hain aur products add kiye to unka scoring aap theek se baat hai sir add products hue hain to thoda sa time lagega score wagera karne mein. Ki aaj maine dobara ranking theek ki hai.
Customer: Theek hai na? Baki abhi main kar leti hu madam bhi kar leti hai apne side se kar leti hu. Theek hai?
Executive: Aapko aapko jahan bhi koi dikkat aaye to mujhe voice call kijiye main keh kya raha hu aapse google meet par mere ko nahi hota time judne ka main aapse request kar raha hu isliye aap bhale hi mujhe kuch bhi kaho ki bhai theek hai busy hu to hu main kya kar sakta hu hu busy. But mere ko khana khane ka time nahi hai kahan se karu? Nahi hota time.
Executive: Ab ek maine aapse ye discuss kiya tha sir aap free hai to video meeting ke regarding aaj ji.
Customer: Koi baat nahi koi baat nahi aapne kaha na tab maine kaha main madam join kar raha hu uske baad just koi aa gaya mere bagal mein aap ho sakta hai aawaze bhi aa rahi hongi ab wo neta log hain wo pata nahi kis tarah ki baatein karte hain aapko pata to hai sara kuch.
Executive: Mujhe bhi pata hai na. Mujhe bhi pata tha sir ki aapke sath koi aa rahe hain kyunki aapne mujhe bola tha ki main join kar raha hu.
Customer: Turant hi turant hi maine inko link send kar di aapki. Haan haan madam ne kar di turant.
Executive: Haan maine isliye kar diya tha bhai aap samne wale se maine bola hai to aisa na lage ki bol diya aur phir wait kar rahe hain.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Ab aapke meri ye request hai. Sir ab hum last mein catalog ka scoring wagera theek kar denge theek hai sir?
Executive: Okay mera ek request aur hai yahan se mujhe leads nahi mil rahi hai mujhe response nahi mil raha IndiaMART se. Dekho kai cheeze aisi hoti hai madam abhi ab dusri company ka main naam nahi lunga bas aapko itna bata raha hu hint de raha hu.
Executive: Ji. Just dial hai jiska continue mujhe call aa raha hai bhai aisa aisa kar lo jo aaj jo .com hai aisa kuch karke uska bhi call aa raha hai continue aisa aisa kar lo.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Kuch cheeze jab maine aapko mere account aapke sign hua tha puch lena madam se maine continue is cheez discuss kiya tha unse. Aath din mein mera catalog aap khud hi check karte rehna apni taraf se jaruri nahi main call karu ya na karu aur mujhe aath din mein update dete rehna aapne kaha tha ya nahi kaha tha yaad ho aapko.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul.
Customer: Ek hafte mein aapko jarur. Aapko call hum kitne din mein. Main aapko call bhi karti thi sir piche maine aapko call kiya tha aap utha hi nahi rahe the sir yaad ho aapko. Haan maine maine kya tha meri galti hai wo aapka koi call nahi utha raha. Meri galti hai. Ji madam. Kya galti nahi hai aapne call kiya hua hai. Meri galti hai maine aapka call attend nahi kiya to meri galti hai wo maine keh sakta hu uske liye but aap is inko matlab madam se baat karte hue is catalog wagera. Haan madam se connect kar leti hu madam bhi mera phone uthati hai isme koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai ab aap dekh lena aage se matlab mere ko main isliye clear karne ke liye call pe inko bhi liya aapko bhi to dekho mere ko nahi rehta time main spasht bata raha hu aap logo ka kaam hai aap log jano haan agar koi cheez aisi hai nahi aata samajh mein main bataunga aur uske baad main na batau to phir wo theek hai mera pada rehne do pending mein aaj sir urgent tha isliye maine aapko call kiya tha kyunki products add karne the madam se jyada aapko pata hai.
Executive: Haan magar main bhar chuka hu madam jo product add karta hu main hi karta hu basic information bhar di usme kya price wagera. Material maine sab kuch bhar diya ab pick hai to aap utha lo google se milti julti hai ab itna to aapko bhi thoda bahut matlab jaise fever hai fever ki pick utha lo koi bhi mujhe nahi pata pixel kya hote hain 500 500 mere ko nahi aata samajh mein itna main kyun jhoot bolu. Mere ko itna time bhi nahi rehta kuch main search karta rahu hai na. Ab ek baar dekh lijiye aur mere ko jo leads ka flow nahi aa raha hai usko bhi thoda dekho us par gaur karo kyunki dekho madam bhale hi aapki company nahi hai bhale hi aapki company nahi hai but main seedha aapse bol raha hu indirectly ki ye business mujhe nahi de pa raha hai. Sir client ek baat bataiye client client aap mere ho to sir meri company ho gayi na. Haan to wo wo cheez hai na phir madam aap agar us cheez ko nahi sudharoge to main aapko ek feedback de raha hu ki main unsatisfied hu aapki abhi company se mujhe leads nahi aa rahi proper us hisab se product itne sare add hai magar leads nahi aa rahi kya karan hai aap thoda note kijiye ise meri hisab se ya aur bhi customer ko hisab se sab cheeze properly leads nahi aana kya reason hai?
Executive: Sir iske liye aap kabhi bhi free ho uske liye regarding aapko video meeting karni hogi kyunki proper discussion kar lenge kis tarike se kahan pe kya issue hai. Kar lenge aap kabhi bhi free ho mujhe connect ho.
Customer: Main main de dunga aap office time aapka hota hai kitne baje se?
Executive: Mera 9 se 6 hota hai.
Customer: To 9 se 6 hota hai 9 ke baad main is kam ko sunday ko office rehta hai ya saturday kya aapka dinon mein? Is sunday hamara working hai aap kar sakte hain.
Executive: Okay. Sunday working hai na aapka? To mera sunday office rehta hai to main ek kam karta hu aapko sunday ko kar lunga connect hai na? Theek hai bilkul theek hai. Baki baki agar koi bhi dekho aapka call jo aata hai na mujhe kya lagta hai ki mere paas bahut sare number save hain jaise IndiaMART se teen char logo ke save hain. Kai baar wo promotion ke liye aate rehte hain wo wo test series le lo ye le lo wo aapko malum hai na products ke liye to isliye aur ignore maar deta hu main ki bhai mere ko product abhi nahi karna purchase to main kyun call uthau ab aapka main alag se save kar le raha hu hai na account manager karke aur aap mujhe kabhi bhi call karoge na agar koi aapko aise koi service mujhe bechna hai ya service ko update karane ke liye kar rahe ho to aap message chhod diya karo phir main iske liye kar raha hu direct main call uthaunga aapka hamesha uthaunga ya aapse baatein kar raha hu hai na jab bhi aayega. Theek hai sir. Ya update kar dunga theek hai? But service ke liye aayega to main cut kar dunga cut kar dunga phir. Theek hai na? Bas. Okay. Sir hum kar lete hain ye kam kar lenge.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads.

- Wants to improve product catalog score.

- Difficulty uploading photos with specific pixel dimensions.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to look into lead generation issue.

- Executive offered video meeting to discuss issues.

- Agreed to connect on Sunday for further discussion.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Sunday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, product, ranking, leads
